modName: The Mushroom Hut - A Tel Mithryn Player Home
summary: A cosy mushroom home at the settlement of Tel Mithryn. Requires Draagonborn
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red][b]The Mushroom Hut - A Tel Mithryn Player Home [/b][/color][/heading]

After running around and doing everything I could for one of my favourite NPCs ever, Neloth, I was a little disappointed that I didn't even get my own room at Tel Mithryn. I mean, really? I killed Miraak for you guys! (Well, Mora did anyway) Anyway, I finally gave in and made a small, lore-friendly hut for the area! Obviously, it requires the Dragonborn DLC.

Please note there are TWO versions, one with a key and one without. If you want the hose without the hassle of finding the key, take the optional file. For a more immersive way of gaining it, the key will be in Tel Mithryn, in a room which is only unlocked by completing some quests.

[color=red][b]~NOW FEATURING MOD RESOURCES~[/b][/color]

It features:
* A few crafting stations - Alchemy, enchanting, cooking and some smithing supplies outside
* Ash Yarn Garden
* A couple of storage options
* A bed with a well-rested bonus
* As well as a lovely note from Neloth himself!

Perfect for roleplayers, mages and alchemists. This was pretty fun to make and gave me some good experience with modding so I hope you all like it! Also check out the video below to get a better look at the place.

[youtube]oPJMdU8Niwc[/youtube]

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]

Just drop the file into your data folder. Or use the NMM. To uninstall, just remove the file. Make sure to get your belongings out first though!

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]

This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.
Credit to Oarisstys for the use of the Mod Resources Pack.
Credit to Blary for the use of the Moth in Cage Resource, Food Container Resource and Wall Art Resource.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
